            mp_brand: "SRF",
            ns_site: "srf.ch",
            mp_v: '*null'
        }
        _comscore.push(_comscore_payload);
  </script>

   if (window.navigator.userAgent.match(/MSIE|Trident/) !== null) {

  <script>
   // Critical JS (NO BABEL IN HERE!)
        var timesRun = 0;
        var interval = setInterval(function() {
            timesRun++;
        var cssStatus = window.getComputedStyle(document.querySelector('body'), '::after').getPropertyValue('content').replace(/\"/g, '');
        if (cssStatus === 'main-css-ready' || timesRun === 300) {
            clearInterval(interval);
            document.querySelector('body').classList.remove('body--loading');
            var event = document.createEvent('Event');
            event.initEvent('srf.styles.loaded', true, true);
            window.dispatchEvent(event);
        }
      }, 100);
  </script>

   <div aria-live="polite" class="collection js-collection collection--duo" data-referrer-track="srg_mod2=collection-duo&amp;srg_mod3=Bond-Protagonisten feiern JubilÃ¤en" data-urn="urn:srf:collection:58044" style="">
    <div class="collection__branding-wrapper js-collection-branding-wrapper">
     <div class="collection__content-wrapper js-collection-content-wrapper">
      <h3 class="collection__title">
       <span class="collection__title-text">
        Bond-Protagonisten feiern JubilÃ¤en
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="collection__lead">
       Timothy Dalton spielte 1987 und 1989, Ursula Andress sogar schon 1962 in einem der kultigen Agentenfilme mit.
      </p>
      <ul class="collection__teaser-list js-collection-teaser-list">
       <li class="collection__teaser-item">
        <div class="js-teaser js-teaser-data teaser teaser--size-l" data-date-modified="2021-03-20T10:05:00+01:00" data-date-published="2021-03-20T10:05:00+01:00" data-source="urn:srf:article:19586107">
         <a class="teaser__main js-teaser__main" data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=teaser-size-l-link-0-pos-0" data-urn="urn:srf:article:19586107" href="/kultur/film-serien/timothy-dalton-wird-75-der-bond-der-keinen-bock-hatte">
          <div class="ratio-wrapper teaser__medium-wrapper">
           <div class="ratio ratio--16-9">
            <div class="teaser__medium">
             <div class="image image--media-still-dynamic">
              <img alt="" aria-hidden="true" class="js-lazyload js-lazyload-webp" data-sizes="(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 50vw" data-src="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/640ws/22e6f7.jpg" data-srcset="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/160ws/22e6f7.jpg 160w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/320ws/22e6f7.jpg 320w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/22e6f7.jpg 480w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/640ws/22e6f7.jpg 640w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/960ws/22e6f7.jpg 960w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/1280ws/22e6f7.jpg 1280w" title=""/>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="teaser__content" role="text">
           <div class="teaser__kicker">
            <span class="teaser__kicker-text">
             Timothy Dalton wird 75
            </span>
           </div>
           <span class="teaser__title">
            Der Bond, der keinen Bock hatte
           </span>
           <p class="teaser__lead">
            Timothy Dalton schlÃ¼pfte zweimal in die Rolle von 007. Er liess sich aber lange bitten.
           </p>
           <div class="teaser__info-wrapper js-teaser-info-wrapper">
            <span class="teaser-info js-teaser-info-state teaser-info--video">

   <div aria-live="polite" class="collection js-collection collection--swipeable" data-referrer-track="srg_mod2=collection-swipeable&amp;srg_mod3=Diese Dok-Filme gehen unter die Haut" data-urn="urn:srf:collection:35091" style="">
    <div class="collection__branding-wrapper js-collection-branding-wrapper">
     <div class="collection__content-wrapper js-collection-content-wrapper">
      <h3 class="collection__title">
       <a class="collection__title-link js-collection-title-link" data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=collection-link-0" href="https://www.srf.ch/sendungen/dok">
        <span class="collection__title-text">
         Diese Dok-Filme gehen unter die Haut
        </span>
        <span class="collection__title-a11y-help">
         Landingpage Ã¶ffnen
        </span>
        <span class="collection__title-link-icon">
        </span>
       </a>
      </h3>
      <p class="collection__lead">
       Einblicke in Lebenswelten, die uns manchmal nÃ¤her sind, manchmal weit weit erscheinen. Aber immer interessant sind.
      </p>
      <div class="collection__swipeable-area swipeable-area js-swipeable-area js-is-swipeable" data-event-name="Diese Dok-Filme gehen unter die Haut (6)" data-event-source="collection-swipeable" data-flying-focus-info="ignore-scrollable-container">
       <ul class="collection__teaser-list js-collection-teaser-list swipeable-area__wrapper js-swipeable-area-wrapper">
        <li class="collection__teaser-item swipeable-area__item js-swipeable-area-item">

   <div aria-live="polite" class="collection js-collection collection--hero" data-referrer-track="srg_mod2=collection-hero&amp;srg_mod3=Expedition Meeresgrund" data-urn="urn:srf:collection:58002" style="">

        Expedition Meeresgrund
       </span>

   <div aria-live="polite" class="collection js-collection collection--duo" data-referrer-track="srg_mod2=collection-duo&amp;srg_mod3=Ein Versuch, das GlÃ¼ck zu finden" data-urn="urn:srf:collection:57925" style="">
    <div class="collection__branding-wrapper js-collection-branding-wrapper">

      <h3 class="collection__title">
       <span class="collection__title-text">
        Ein Versuch, das GlÃ¼ck zu finden
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="collection__lead">
       GlÃ¼ck lÃ¤sst sich nicht erzwingen. Aber man kann es ein bisschen trainieren.

      <ul class="collection__teaser-list js-collection-teaser-list">
       <li class="collection__teaser-item">

     <div class="collection__content-wrapper js-collection-content-wrapper">
      <h3 class="collection__title">
       <span class="collection__title-text">
        Â«KassensturzÂ»-Tests
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="collection__lead">
       Vom Â«KassensturzÂ» auf Herz und Nieren geprÃ¼ft und fÃ¼r gut, genÃ¼gend oder schlecht befunden.
      </p>
      <div class="collection__swipeable-area swipeable-area js-swipeable-area js-is-swipeable" data-event-name="Â«KassensturzÂ»-Tests (5)" data-event-source="collection-swipeable" data-flying-focus-info="ignore-scrollable-container">

        <li class="collection__teaser-item swipeable-area__item js-swipeable-area-item">
         <div class="js-teaser js-teaser-data teaser teaser--size-m teaser--with-links" data-date-modified="2021-03-16T22:31:00+01:00" data-date-published="2021-03-16T09:47:00+01:00" data-source="urn:srf:article:19580822">
          <a class="teaser__main js-teaser__main" data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=teaser-size-m-link-0-pos-0" data-urn="urn:srf:article:19580822" href="/sendungen/kassensturz-espresso/buerostuehle-im-test-der-richtige-fuers-homeoffice">
           <div class="ratio-wrapper teaser__medium-wrapper">
            <div class="ratio ratio--16-9">
             <div class="teaser__medium">
              <div class="image image--media-still-dynamic">
               <img alt="" aria-hidden="true" class="js-lazyload js-lazyload-webp" data-sizes="(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 33.4vw" data-src="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/69499c.jpg" data-srcset="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/160ws/69499c.jpg 160w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/320ws/69499c.jpg 320w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/69499c.jpg 480w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/640ws/69499c.jpg 640w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/960ws/69499c.jpg 960w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/1280ws/69499c.jpg 1280w" title=""/>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="teaser__content" role="text">
            <div class="teaser__kicker">
             <span class="teaser__kicker-text">
              Die richtige Haltung
             </span>
            </div>
            <span class="teaser__title">
             BÃ¼rostÃ¼hle im Test: Der Richtige fÃ¼rs Homeoffice
            </span>
            <p class="teaser__lead">
             Ein Drittel der StÃ¼hle fiel durch. Beim Test waren Langlebigkeit, Standsicherheit und Komfort die wichtigsten Kriterien.
            </p>
            <div class="teaser__info-wrapper js-teaser-info-wrapper">
             <span class="teaser-info js-teaser-info-state teaser-info--video">
              Mit Video
             </span>

        <li class="collection__teaser-item swipeable-area__item js-swipeable-area-item">
         <div class="js-teaser js-teaser-data teaser teaser--size-m teaser--with-links" data-date-modified="2021-03-09T20:52:00+01:00" data-date-published="2021-03-09T10:15:00+01:00" data-source="urn:srf:article:19561022">
          <a class="teaser__main js-teaser__main" data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=teaser-size-m-link-0-pos-1" data-urn="urn:srf:article:19561022" href="/sendungen/kassensturz-espresso/pizza-fertigteig-im-test-kaum-schimmelspuren-gefunden">
           <div class="ratio-wrapper teaser__medium-wrapper">
            <div class="ratio ratio--16-9">
             <div class="teaser__medium">
              <div class="image image--media-still-dynamic">
               <img alt="" aria-hidden="true" class="js-lazyload js-lazyload-webp" data-sizes="(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 33.4vw" data-src="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/ea5a52.jpg" data-srcset="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/160ws/ea5a52.jpg 160w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/320ws/ea5a52.jpg 320w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/ea5a52.jpg 480w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/640ws/ea5a52.jpg 640w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/960ws/ea5a52.jpg 960w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/1280ws/ea5a52.jpg 1280w" title=""/>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="teaser__content" role="text">
            <div class="teaser__kicker">
             <span class="teaser__kicker-text">
              Labor-Untersuchung
             </span>
            </div>
            <span class="teaser__title">
             Pizza-Fertigteig im Test: Kaum Schimmelspuren gefunden
            </span>
            <p class="teaser__lead">
             Â«KassensturzÂ» hat zwÃ¶lf Produkte im Labor untersuchen lassen. Bis auf eine Ausnahme arbeiten die Hersteller sauber.
            </p>
            <div class="teaser__info-wrapper js-teaser-info-wrapper">
             <span class="teaser-info js-teaser-info-state teaser-info--video">
              Mit Video
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
          </a>

   <div aria-live="polite" class="collection js-collection collection--dense-swipeable" data-referrer-track="srg_mod2=collection-dense-swipeable&amp;srg_mod3=Jetzt Podcasts von SRF entdecken" data-urn="urn:srf:collection:53013" style="">
    <div class="collection__branding-wrapper js-collection-branding-wrapper">
     <div class="collection__content-wrapper js-collection-content-wrapper">
      <h3 class="collection__title">
       <span class="collection__title-text">
        Jetzt Podcasts von SRF entdecken
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p class="collection__lead">
       Vieles geht damit leichter von der Hand. Putzen, kochen oder einfach runterfahren.
      </p>
      <div class="collection__swipeable-area swipeable-area js-swipeable-area js-is-swipeable" data-event-name="Jetzt Podcasts von SRF entdecken (8)" data-event-source="collection-dense-swipeable" data-flying-focus-info="ignore-scrollable-container">
       <ul class="collection__teaser-list js-collection-teaser-list swipeable-area__wrapper js-swipeable-area-wrapper">

   <div aria-live="polite" class="collection js-collection collection--swipeable collection--branded collection--with-light-text-in-lightmode collection--with-light-text-in-darkmode" data-referrer-track="srg_mod2=collection-swipeable&amp;srg_mod3=Die Meistgesehenen der letzten Monate - Play SRF Mediathek" data-urn="urn:srf:collection:1771" style="
        --branded-background-color-start: #22211D;
        --branded-background-color-start-transparent: rgba(34,33,29,0.7);
        --branded-background-color-end: #111111;
        --branded-background-color-end-transparent: rgba(17,17,17,0.7);
        --branded-background-color-dark-start: #2E2D29;
        --branded-background-color-dark-start-transparent: rgba(46,45,41,0.7);
        --branded-background-color-dark-end: #222222;
        --branded-background-color-dark-end-transparent: rgba(34,34,34,0.7);
        ">
    <div class="collection__branding-wrapper js-collection-branding-wrapper">
     <div class="collection__content-wrapper js-collection-content-wrapper">
      <h3 class="collection__title">
       <a class="collection__title-link js-collection-title-link" data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=collection-link-0" href="https://www.srf.ch/play/tv">

  <script type="text/javascript">
   function fetchMetaData() {
        var webtrekk = {"content_title_pretty":"SRF Home","content_category_1":"Home","content_category_2":"SRF Home","content_category_3":null,"content_category_4":null,"content_id":4267482,"content_page_type":"Landingpage","content_page_elements":null,"content_tags_subject":null,"content_publication_date":"2014.03.21","content_publication_date_concatenated":"20140321","content_publication_time":"10:29","content_publication_time_concatenated":"1029","content_publication_datetime_concatenated":"201403211029","content_title":"srf-home-2","content_publication_version":"5986"},
            weburl = 'https://www.srf.ch/',
            shortLead = '';

        if (webtrekk && typeof localStorage === 'object') {
            var storedData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('srf:analytics:mod:app'));
            webtrekk.srg_mod1 = getModData(storedData, 'mod1');
            webtrekk.srg_mod2 = getModData(storedData, 'mod2');
            webtrekk.srg_mod3 = getModData(storedData, 'mod3');
            webtrekk.srg_mod4 = getModData(storedData, 'mod4');
            localStorage.removeItem('srf:analytics:mod:app');
            Object.keys(webtrekk).forEach(function (key) {
                (webtrekk[key] === 'undefined') && delete webtrekk[key];
            })
        }

        nativebridge.onMetadataRetrieved(JSON.stringify({
            'weburl': weburl,
            'title': webtrekk.content_title_pretty,
            'shortLead': shortLead,
            'type': webtrekk.content_page_type,
            'webtrekk': webtrekk
        }));

        nativebridge.fetchMetaDataWasCalled = true;
    }

    function getModData(storedData, key) {
        var result = 'undefined';
        if (storedData) {
            if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srg_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srg_' + key];
            } else if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srf_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srf_' + key];
            }

            if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srg_override_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srg_override_' + key];
            }
        }

        return decodeURIComponent(decodeURIComponent(result)).replace('+', ' ');
    }

    function setDeviceInfo(data) {
        if (typeof localStorage === 'object') {
            try {
                localStorage.setItem('sg_app_data', JSON.stringify(data));
                var event = new CustomEvent("setDeviceInfo", {});
                document.dispatchEvent(event);
            } catch (e) {
            }
        }
    }
  </script>
